sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Grid,
  Text,
  Flex,
  Accordion,
  rem,
  Center,
  Avatar,
  Badge,
  Checkbox,
  Button,
  ColorPicker,
  Input,
  Stack,
  Image,
  Card,
  Group,
  Slider,
} from "@mantine/core";
import { Dropzone } from "@mantine/dropzone";
import ResponsivePhone from "./ResponsivePhone";
import HeaderMenu from "./Header/HeaderMenu";
import { IconPlus, IconLetterX } from "@tabler/icons-react";
const Home = () => {
  const [value, setValue] = useState(1);
  const [boxValue, setBoxValue] = useState(1);
  const [paddingValue, setPaddingValue] = useState(1);
  const [marginValue, setMarginValue] = useState(1);

  const [categoryListBoxVisible, setCategoryListBoxVisible] = useState(false);
  const [categoryWithProductVisible, setCategoryWithProductVisible] =
    useState(false);

  const handleRadiusChange = (newValue) => {
    setBoxValue(newValue);
  };

  const handleRadiusIncrement = () => {
    const newValue = boxValue + 1;
    if (newValue <= 100) {
      setBoxValue(newValue);
    }
  };

  const handlePaddingChange = (newValue) => {
    setPaddingValue(newValue);
  };

  const handlePaddingIncrement = () => {
    const newValue = paddingValue + 1;
    if (newValue <= 100) {
      setPaddingValue(newValue);
    }
  };

  const handleMarginChange = (newValue) => {
    setMarginValue(newValue);
  };

  const handleMarginIncrement = () => {
    const newValue = marginValue + 1;
    if (newValue <= 100) {
      setMarginValue(newValue);
    }
  };

  const handleCategoryListClick = () => {
    setCategoryListBoxVisible(true);
    setCategoryWithProductVisible(false);
  };

  const handleCategoryWithProductClick = () => {
    setCategoryWithProductVisible(true);
    setCategoryListBoxVisible(false);
  };

  return (
    <Grid>
      <Grid.Col span={4}>
        <Box m="xs" bg="gray.2" style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}>
          <Flex
            mih={50}
            mt="xs"
            bg="indigo.5"
            gap="md"
            justify="center"
            align="center"
            direction="row"
            wrap="wrap"
            style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}
          >
            <Text fw={900} c={`#FFFFFF`}>
              Layouts
            </Text>
            <Box justify="flex-end">
              <IconLetterX
                style={{
                  border: "1px solid #000",
                  borderRadius: "50%",
                  background: "red",
                  color: "white",
                }}
              />
            </Box>
          </Flex>
          {/* Slider */}
          <Accordion ml="xs" mr="xs" variant="contained">
            <Accordion.Item value="photos">
              <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
                <Center>
                  <Text fw={700}>Slider</Text>
                </Center>
              </Accordion.Control>
              <Accordion.Panel>Content</Accordion.Panel>
            </Accordion.Item>
          </Accordion>
          {/* Category List */}
          <Accordion ml="xs" mr="xs" variant="contained">
            <Accordion.Item value="photos">
              <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
                <Center>
                  <Text fw={700}>Category List</Text>
                </Center>
              </Accordion.Control>
              <Accordion.Panel bg="gray.2">
                <Box
                  mb="xs"
                  bg="#FFFFFF"
                  onClick={handleCategoryListClick}
                  style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
                >
                  <Flex
                    h={100}
                    justify="center"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://blogassets.leverageedu.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/02232228/BSc-Electronics.png"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs">Electronics</Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://hnsfpau.imgix.net/5/images/detailed/240/TH-32JS610Z.01.jpg?fit=fill&bg=0FFF&w=1500&h=844&auto=format,compress"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs">Accessories</Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://i0.wp.com/post.healthline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Best_Baby_Clothes_1296x728.png?w=1155&h=1528"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs">Clothing</Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://media.gq.com/photos/63eba1b2275d2fef78a425c2/16:9/w_2560%2Cc_limit/nike-running-shoes-streakfly-invincible.jpg"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs">Shoes</Text>
                    </Flex>
                  </Flex>
                </Box>
                <Box
                  bg="dark"
                  onClick={handleCategoryListClick}
                  style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
                >
                  <Flex
                    h={100}
                    justify="center"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://blogassets.leverageedu.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/02232228/BSc-Electronics.png"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs" c={"gray.0"}>
                        Electronics
                      </Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://hnsfpau.imgix.net/5/images/detailed/240/TH-32JS610Z.01.jpg?fit=fill&bg=0FFF&w=1500&h=844&auto=format,compress"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs" c={"gray.0"}>
                        Accessories
                      </Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://i0.wp.com/post.healthline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Best_Baby_Clothes_1296x728.png?w=1155&h=1528"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs" c={"gray.0"}>
                        Clothing
                      </Text>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                      <Avatar
                        variant="filled"
                        radius="sm"
                        size="lg"
                        color="yellow"
                        src="https://media.gq.com/photos/63eba1b2275d2fef78a425c2/16:9/w_2560%2Cc_limit/nike-running-shoes-streakfly-invincible.jpg"
                      />
                      <Text size="xs" c={"gray.0"}>
                        Shoes
                      </Text>
                    </Flex>
                    {/* <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
                        <Avatar
                          variant="filled"
                          radius="sm"
                          size="lg"
                          color="yellow"
                          src="https://blogassets.leverageedu.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/02232228/BSc-Electronics.png"
                        />
                        <Text size="xs">Galaxy</Text>
                      </Flex> */}
                  </Flex>
                </Box>
                <Box
                  bg="dark"
                  mt="xs"
                  onClick={handleCategoryListClick}
                  style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
                >
                  <Flex
                    h={50}
                    justify="center"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    gap="md"
                  >
                    <Flex
                      gap="md"
                      justify="center"
                      align="center"
                      direction="row"
                    >
                      <Badge color="blue">All Product</Badge>
                      <Badge color="dark.4">Electronics</Badge>
                      <Badge color="dark.4">Clothing</Badge>
                    </Flex>
                  </Flex>
                </Box>
              </Accordion.Panel>
            </Accordion.Item>
          </Accordion>
          {/* Category With Product */}
          <Accordion ml="xs" mr="xs" variant="contained">
            <Accordion.Item value="photos">
              <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
                <Center>
                  <Text fw={700}>Category With Product</Text>
                </Center>
              </Accordion.Control>
              <Accordion.Panel>
                <Box
                  bg="gray.2"
                  onClick={handleCategoryWithProductClick}
                  style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
                >
                  <Text ml="xs">Hot Sales</Text>
                  <Flex
                    h={220}
                    gap="2px"
                    justify="flex-start"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    wrap="wrap"
                  >
                    <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={90}>
                      <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                        On Sale
                      </Badge>
                      <Card.Section>
                        <Image
                          ml="xs"
                          mr="xs"
                          radius="md"
                          h={100}
                          w={70}
                          fit="contain"
                          src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                          alt="Norway"
                        />
                      </Card.Section>
                      <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                      <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                    </Card>
                    <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={90}>
                      <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                        On Sale
                      </Badge>
                      <Card.Section>
                        <Image
                          ml="xs"
                          mr="xs"
                          radius="md"
                          h={100}
                          w={70}
                          fit="contain"
                          src="https://sonysmart.com.bd/public/uploads/all/wmAR0iWAr5pRubmvbCtS0bXtrzqhpTCD2nUxSaDN.jpg"
                          alt="Norway"
                        />
                      </Card.Section>
                      <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                      <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                    </Card>
                    <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={90}>
                      <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                        On Sale
                      </Badge>
                      <Card.Section>
                        <Image
                          ml="xs"
                          mr="xs"
                          radius="md"
                          h={100}
                          w={70}
                          fit="contain"
                          src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                          alt="Norway"
                        />
                      </Card.Section>
                      <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                      <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                    </Card>
                  </Flex>
                </Box>

                <Box
                  bg="gray.2"
                  mt="xs"
                  onClick={handleCategoryWithProductClick}
                  style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
                >
                  <Text ml="xs">Hot Sales</Text>
                  <Flex
                    h={440}
                    gap="2px"
                    justify="flex-start"
                    align="center"
                    direction="row"
                    wrap="wrap"
                  >
                    <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={150}>
                      <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                        On Sale
                      </Badge>
                      <Card.Section>
                        <Image
                          radius="md"
                          ml="xs"
                          h={100}
                          w="auto"
                          fit="contain"
                          src="https://johnlewis.scene7.com/is/image/JohnLewis/laptop-carousel1-010323"
                          alt="Norway"
                        />
                      </Card.Section>
                      <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                      <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                    </Card>
                    <Card ml="xs" shadow="sm" padding="xs" radius="md" w={150}>
                      <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                        On Sale
                      </Badge>
                      <Card.Section>
                        <Image
                          ml="xs"
                          mr="xs"
                          radius="md"
                          h={100}
                          w="auto"
                          fit="contain"
                          src="https://sonysmart.com.bd/public/uploads/all/wmAR0iWAr5pRubmvbCtS0bXtrzqhpTCD2nUxSaDN.jpg"
                          alt="Norway"
                        />
                      </Card.Section>
                      <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                      <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                    </Card>
                    <Card
                      ml="xs"
                      mt="xs"
                      shadow="sm"
                      padding="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      w={150}
                    >
                      <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                        On Sale
                      </Badge>
                      <Card.Section>
                        <Image
                          ml="xs"
                          mr="xs"
                          radius="md"
                          h={100}
                          w="auto"
                          fit="contain"
                          src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                          alt="Norway"
                        />
                      </Card.Section>
                      <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                      <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                    </Card>
                    <Card
                      ml="xs"
                      mt="xs"
                      shadow="sm"
                      padding="xs"
                      radius="md"
                      w={150}
                    >
                      <Badge color="pink" variant="light" mb="xs">
                        On Sale
                      </Badge>
                      <Card.Section>
                        <Image
                          ml="xs"
                          mr="xs"
                          radius="md"
                          h={100}
                          w="auto"
                          fit="contain"
                          src="https://images.macrumors.com/t/RnswrVxVO5LlEOaPBJfTaCue5iU=/1200x1200/smart/article-new/2023/02/airpods-pro-2-red-pink.jpg"
                          alt="Norway"
                        />
                      </Card.Section>
                      <Text fw={500}>Dell</Text>
                      <Text fw={500}>$29,999</Text>
                    </Card>
                  </Flex>
                </Box>
              </Accordion.Panel>
            </Accordion.Item>
          </Accordion>
          {/* Brand List */}
          <Accordion ml="xs" mr="xs" variant="contained">
            <Accordion.Item value="photos">
              <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
                <Center>
                  <Text fw={700}>Brand List</Text>
                </Center>
              </Accordion.Control>
              <Accordion.Panel>Content</Accordion.Panel>
            </Accordion.Item>
          </Accordion>
          {/* Brand With Product */}
          <Accordion ml="xs" mr="xs" variant="contained">
            <Accordion.Item value="photos">
              <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
                <Center>
                  <Text fw={700}>Brand With Product</Text>
                </Center>
              </Accordion.Control>
              <Accordion.Panel>Content</Accordion.Panel>
            </Accordion.Item>
          </Accordion>
          {/* Latest Product/ Recently Added */}
          <Accordion ml="xs" mr="xs" variant="contained">
            <Accordion.Item value="photos">
              <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
                <Center>
                  <Text fw={700}>Latest Product/ Recently Added</Text>
                </Center>
              </Accordion.Control>
              <Accordion.Panel>Content</Accordion.Panel>
            </Accordion.Item>
          </Accordion>
          {/* Most Populer Product */}
          <Accordion ml="xs" mr="xs" mb="xs" variant="contained">
            <Accordion.Item value="photos">
              <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
                <Center>
                  <Text fw={700}>Most Populer Product</Text>
                </Center>
              </Accordion.Control>
              <Accordion.Panel>Content</Accordion.Panel>
            </Accordion.Item>
          </Accordion>
        </Box>
      </Grid.Col>
      <Grid.Col span={4} mt="xs">
        <ResponsivePhone />
      </Grid.Col>
      <Grid.Col span={4}>
        {/* Category List Customize Box */}
        {categoryListBoxVisible && (
          <Box
            m="xs"
            h={`fit-content`}
            bg="gray.2"
            style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}
          >
            <Flex
              mih={50}
              mt="xs"
              bg="indigo.5"
              gap="md"
              justify="center"
              align="center"
              direction="row"
              wrap="wrap"
              style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}
            >
              <Text size="xl" c={`#FFFFFF`}>
                Customize
              </Text>
            </Flex>
            {/* Category Item */}
            <Accordion
              m="xs"
              mb="xs"
              variant="contained"
              defaultValue="category-item"
            >
              <Accordion.Item value="category-item">
                <Accordion.Control bg="#FFFFFF">
                  <Text>Category Item</Text>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel bg="#FFFFFF">
                  <Accordion m="xs" variant="contained">
                    <Accordion.Item value="electronics">
                      <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                        <Flex
                          justify="flex-start"
                          align="center"
                          direction="row"
                          gap="md"
                        >
                          <Checkbox />
                          <Text>Electronics</Text>
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Control>
                      <Accordion.Panel>
                        <Dropzone
                          bg="white"
                          h="5rem"
                          style={{
                            border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                            borderRadius: "5px",
                          }}
                        >
                          <Text mt="1.5rem" ta="center">
                            Select Image
                          </Text>
                        </Dropzone>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                          <ColorPicker
                            mt="xs"
                            w="auto"
                            size="lg"
                            format="rgba"
                          />
                        </Flex>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                          <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Panel>
                    </Accordion.Item>
                  </Accordion>

                  <Accordion m="xs" variant="contained">
                    <Accordion.Item value="photos">
                      <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                        <Flex
                          justify="flex-start"
                          align="center"
                          direction="row"
                          gap="md"
                        >
                          <Checkbox />
                          <Text>Accessories</Text>
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Control>
                      <Accordion.Panel>
                        <Dropzone
                          bg="white"
                          h="5rem"
                          style={{
                            border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                            borderRadius: "5px",
                          }}
                        >
                          <Text mt="1.5rem" ta="center">
                            Select Image
                          </Text>
                        </Dropzone>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                          <ColorPicker
                            mt="xs"
                            w="auto"
                            size="lg"
                            format="rgba"
                          />
                        </Flex>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                          <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Panel>
                    </Accordion.Item>
                  </Accordion>

                  <Accordion m="xs" variant="contained">
                    <Accordion.Item value="photos">
                      <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                        <Flex
                          justify="flex-start"
                          align="center"
                          direction="row"
                          gap="md"
                        >
                          <Checkbox />
                          <Text>Clothing</Text>
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Control>
                      <Accordion.Panel>
                        <Dropzone
                          bg="white"
                          h="5rem"
                          style={{
                            border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                            borderRadius: "5px",
                          }}
                        >
                          <Text mt="1.5rem" ta="center">
                            Select Image
                          </Text>
                        </Dropzone>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                          <ColorPicker
                            mt="xs"
                            w="auto"
                            size="lg"
                            format="rgba"
                          />
                        </Flex>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                          <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Panel>
                    </Accordion.Item>
                  </Accordion>

                  <Accordion m="xs" variant="contained">
                    <Accordion.Item value="photos">
                      <Accordion.Control bg="gray.2" direction="row">
                        <Flex
                          justify="flex-start"
                          align="center"
                          direction="row"
                          gap="md"
                        >
                          <Checkbox />
                          <Text>Shoes</Text>
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Control>
                      <Accordion.Panel>
                        <Dropzone
                          bg="white"
                          h="5rem"
                          style={{
                            border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                            borderRadius: "5px",
                          }}
                        >
                          <Text mt="1.5rem" ta="center">
                            Select Image
                          </Text>
                        </Dropzone>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Background Color</Text>
                          <ColorPicker
                            mt="xs"
                            w="auto"
                            size="lg"
                            format="rgba"
                          />
                        </Flex>
                        <Flex direction="column">
                          <Text mt="xs">Level</Text>
                          <Input placeholder="Input component" />
                        </Flex>
                      </Accordion.Panel>
                    </Accordion.Item>
                  </Accordion>

                  <Button ml="xs" w={`95%`}>
                    + Add More
                  </Button>
                </Accordion.Panel>
              </Accordion.Item>
            </Accordion>
            {/* settings */}
            <Accordion m="xs" mb="xs" variant="contained">
              <Accordion.Item value="photos">
                <Accordion.Control bg="#FFFFFF">
                  <Text>Settings</Text>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel bg="#FFFFFF">
                  <Stack>
                    {/* Box Radius */}
                    <Text>Box Radius</Text>
                    <Flex
                      mih={50}
                      bg="white"
                      gap="md"
                      justify="center"
                      align="center"
                      direction="row"
                      wrap="wrap"
                      style={{
                        border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                        borderRadius: "5px",
                      }}
                    >
                      <Input
                        type="number"
                        value={boxValue}
                        w={50}
                        readOnly
                        style={{ borderRadius: "20px" }}
                      />
                      <Slider
                        my="xs"
                        value={boxValue}
                        onChange={handleRadiusChange}
                        min={0}
                        max={100}
                        w={180}
                        label={null}
                      />
                      <Button onClick={handleRadiusIncrement}>+</Button>
                    </Flex>
                    {/* padding */}
                    <Text>Padding</Text>
                    <Flex
                      mih={50}
                      bg="white"
                      gap="md"
                      justify="center"
                      align="center"
                      direction="row"
                      wrap="wrap"
                      style={{
                        border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                        borderRadius: "5px",
                      }}
                    >
                      <Input
                        type="number"
                        value={paddingValue}
                        w={50}
                        readOnly
                        style={{ borderRadius: "20px" }}
                      />
                      <Slider
                        my="xs"
                        value={paddingValue}
                        onChange={handlePaddingChange}
                        min={0}
                        max={100}
                        w={180}
                        label={null}
                      />
                      <Button onClick={handlePaddingIncrement}>+</Button>
                    </Flex>
                    {/* Margin */}
                    <Text>Margin</Text>
                    <Flex
                      mih={50}
                      bg="white"
                      gap="md"
                      justify="center"
                      align="center"
                      direction="row"
                      wrap="wrap"
                      style={{
                        border: "1px solid #1b1c1b",
                        borderRadius: "5px",
                      }}
                    >
                      <Input
                        type="number"
                        value={marginValue}
                        w={50}
                        readOnly
                        style={{ borderRadius: "20px" }}
                      />
                      <Slider
                        my="xs"
                        value={marginValue}
                        onChange={handleMarginChange}
                        min={0}
                        max={100}
                        w={200}
                        label={null}
                      />
                      <IconPlus
                        onClick={handleMarginIncrement}
                        style={{
                          border: "1px solid #000",
                          borderRadius: "50%",
                        }}
                      />
                    </Flex>
                  </Stack>
                </Accordion.Panel>
              </Accordion.Item>
            </Accordion>
          </Box>
        )}
        {/* Category With Product Customize Box */}
        {categoryWithProductVisible && (
          <Box
            m="xs"
            h={`fit-content`}
            bg="gray.2"
            style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}
          >
            <Flex
              mih={50}
              mt="xs"
              bg="indigo.5"
              gap="md"
              justify="center"
              align="center"
              direction="row"
              wrap="wrap"
              style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}
            >
              <Text size="xl" c={`#FFFFFF`}>
                Customize
              </Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex
              ml="xs"
              mr="xs"
              mt="xs"
              mih={50}
              bg="#FFFFFF"
              gap="xs"
              justify="center"
              align="flex-start"
              direction="column"
              wrap="wrap"
              style={{ borderRadius: "10px" }}
            >
              <Text ml="xs">Header</Text>
              <Input size="xs" ml="xs" mr="xs" mb="xs" w={`95%`} placeholder="Input component" />
            </Flex>

            <Accordion.Item value="category-item">
                <Accordion.Control bg="#FFFFFF">
                  <Text>Category Item</Text>
                </Accordion.Control>
                <Accordion.Panel bg="#FFFFFF">

                </Accordion.Panel>
                </Accordion.Item>
          </Box>
        )}
      </Grid.Col>
    </Grid>
  );
};

export default Home;
